name: Digital Cinema Initiative Package (DCP).  Described in the Digital Cinema System Specification v1.0, July 20, 2005
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: The DCP is a set of encrypted files representing digital moving image content packaged for shipment to theaters. The DCP is based on the DCDM, and its files or tracks contain images, audio, subpictures and/or timed text, and auxiliary data.
